messages.content: Given stats of all weapons in stalker 2, which one is the most powerfull and can be obtained before "point of no return"?

Determining the "most powerful" weapon in *S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl* before the "point of no return" depends on your play style and what you consider "powerful" (damage, accuracy, rate of fire, etc.). However, here's a breakdown of some top contenders across different weapon types, considering their stats and ease of acquisition:

**For a good all-around weapon:**

*   **AKM-74S:** This assault rifle is a solid early-game choice due to its wide availability, common ammo, manageable recoil, and decent accuracy for medium to long-range combat [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). A unique variant, "Valik Lummox's AKM74s" with an extended magazine and scope, can be found during the "Warlock's Debtor" side mission [gamepressure](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [pcgamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2). The "Drowned" AKM-74S is also considered a top variant and can be found near the Slag Heap [screenrant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).

**For accuracy:**

*   **GP37:** This German-made rifle is known as the most accurate in the game, featuring a standard scope [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Find it in the Plant Boiler Station area of the Garbage region [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).

**For close-quarters combat:**

*   **Viper-5:** This SMG is effective in medium and short-range engagements due to its high rate of fire and large magazine [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5). You can find it soon after clearing the prologue [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5). "Shah's Mate," a powerful variant of the Viper-5, can be acquired during the "No Honor Among Thieves" side quest [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).

**For Shotgun enthusiasts:**

*   **Texan:** This shotgun has some of the highest damage and rate of fire among all shotguns, making it a perfect choice for any adventurer [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7). It can be found by visiting one of the Abandoned Science Campus pods in the southeast area of the Jupiter region [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).

**For long-range engagements:**

*   **SVDM-2:** This sniper rifle offers high damage, penetration, and accuracy [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3). It can be looted from Leshy, a bandit leader at the abandoned factory, North-East of Zalissya [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   **M71 Super:** The M71 Super can one-shot the harder exoskeleton enemies in the head on veteran difficulty [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9).

**For raw power (but potentially later acquisition):**

*   **Gauss Gun:** This weapon boasts excellent damage and can eliminate tough enemies [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7). It's obtained by completing the "In the Name of Science" side mission [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).

**Pistols**

*   **Rhino:** Considered one of the best pistols, the Rhino is a hard-hitting hunting revolver with the highest damage of any other pistol in the game [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). It uses AR ammunition and has a high penetration rating [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Find it on a body in the middle of Yantar [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).

**Important Considerations:**

*   **Ammo:** Always consider the availability of ammunition [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   **Condition:** Be prepared to repair looted weapons [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5). Technicians can repair weapons [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-13].
*   **Customization:** Utilize attachments and upgrades to enhance your chosen weapon [deltiasgaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10) [rockpapershotgun](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-10) [mapgenie](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-8).

Ultimately, the "most powerful" weapon is subjective and depends on your play style and the specific situation. Experiment with different weapons and find what works best for you.

search_query: stalker 2 weapon stats comparison pre point of no return
stalker 2 best weapon before point of no return
web_research_result:
It appears you're asking for a pre-"point of no return" weapon stats comparison in *S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl*. This is a breakdown of what the search results provide: 

 **1. Weapon Lists and Types** 

 *   There are a variety of weapons in *S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2*, including pistols, submachine guns, shotguns, assault rifles, sniper rifles, machine guns, and grenade launchers [stalker2](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1) [pcgamesn](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2). 
 *   Some specific weapons mentioned include the AKM-74S, AKM-74U, TOZ-34, and PTM [ign](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). 
 *   Unique weapons with special attributes and locations exist in the game [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3) [pcgamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4). Some unique weapons are only available in the Deluxe or Ultimate editions of the game [pcgamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4). 

 **2. Weapon Stats and Performance** 

 *   Factors like damage, penetration, rate of fire, range, and accuracy determine a weapon's effectiveness [itc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) [vgtimes](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-6). 
 *   Some weapons are better suited for specific ammo types [thegamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-7). For example, the Dnipro is considered the best for 5.45x39mm ammo due to its high overall stats [thegamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-7). 
 *   The Zubr-19 is highlighted as an SMG with a 50-round magazine, good rate of fire, and respectable damage [thegamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-7). A unique variant called 'Rat Killer' has slightly better stats [thegamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-7). 
 *   The SVU-MK S-3 is noted as a strong sniper rifle with high damage, good rate of fire and range, and is lighter than other sniper rifles using the same ammo [thegamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-7). 
 *   The M701 Super is presented as the best weapon for .308 ammo, having high damage and a long-range scope [thegamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-7). 

 **3. Weapon Customization** 

 *   Weapons can be customized with attachments found throughout the Zone [mapgenie](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-8). 
 *   Attachments can be added or removed at any time, even in the field [techraptor](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-9). 
 *   Upgrades can be purchased from Technicians to improve weapon stats [rockpapershotgun](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-10) [mapgenie](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-8). Some upgrades might be required to use certain attachments [techraptor](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-9). 
 *   Some upgrades are mutually exclusive [rockpapershotgun](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-10) [techraptor](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-9). 

 **4. Unique Weapons and Locations** 

 *   Unique weapons can be found in the game world or as part of missions [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3). Many are missable [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3). 
 *   "Valik Lummox's AKM74s" can be found in a stash in the water tower during the "Warlock's Debtor" mission [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3). 
 *   "Unknown Stalker's AR416" is obtained by giving Pomor the icon during the "Poppy Fields" quest [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3). 
 *   The "Drowned" is a unique version of the AKM74S with higher base damage and a double magazine [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-11). 
 *   "Shah's Mate" is a unique Viper 5 SMG with better stats, located in the center of the Garbage zone [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-11). 

 **5. Weapon Durability and Repair** 

 *   Weapons have health and durability stats [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-12). Gun health indicates how much damage a gun can take from environmental factors, while durability is the rate at which it loses health [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-12). 
 *   Armor-piercing ammunition can reduce weapon durability [itc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5). 
 *   Technicians can repair weapons [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-13). 

 **6. Ammo Types** 

 *   Armor-piercing rounds increase armor penetration but reduce weapon durability [itc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5). 
 *   Silencers reduce noise but may decrease range [itc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5). 

 Keep in mind that weapon stats and availability might change with game updates and patches.
It appears you're asking about the best weapons to acquire in "Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl" before reaching a point of no return in the game. Based on the search results, here's a breakdown of some of the top contenders:

**Assault Rifles**

*   **AKM-74S:** This is a highly recommended all-around weapon for the early game [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). It's widely available, uses common ammo, has manageable recoil, and offers good accuracy for medium to long-range engagements [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). You can find it with a Stalwart companion [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Valik Lummox's AKM-74S is a unique variant with an extended magazine and scope, found on top of a water tower north of Zalissya during the "Warlock's Debtor" side mission [gamepressure](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [pcgamer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   **AR416 Monolith:** This military-grade rifle boasts excellent accuracy and a fast fire rate [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3). However, its ammo can be rare and expensive [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3). It can be found in the Journalist's Stash near the Military Base, southeast of Zalissya [gamepressure](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   **Drowned AKM-74S:** The "Drowned" version of the AKM-74S is considered by some to be the best AKM-74S variant [screenrant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4). It can be found just outside the Slag Heap [screenrant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   **GP37:** This German-made rifle is known as the most accurate in the game, featuring a standard scope [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Find it in the Plant Boiler Station area of the Garbage region [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).

**Submachine Guns (SMGs)**

*   **Viper-5:** This is a solid choice for medium and short-range combat in the early game, thanks to its high rate of fire and large magazine [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5). Be mindful of its high recoil, making it less effective at longer ranges [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5). You can find it soon after clearing the prologue [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   **Shah's Mate:** A powerful variant of the Viper-5 SMG, acquired by speaking to the Docent in the "No Honor Among Thieves" side quest [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). It features three firing modes and an upgradable magazine, making it a good secondary weapon due to its light weight [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   **Riemann:** This unique SMG, adapted from the Integral-A, is considered one of the best guns to use throughout the entire game because of its accuracy and handling [rockpapershotgun](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).

**Shotguns**

*   **SPSA-14:** If you prefer shotguns, the SPSA-14 is a strong contender, delivering a high volume of iron pellets [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   **Texan:** This shotgun has some of the highest damage and rate of fire among all shotguns, making it a perfect choice for any adventurer [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7). It can be found by visiting one of the Abandoned Science Campus pods in the southeast area of the Jupiter region [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).
*   **Boomstick:** You can get a full-durability Boomstick by going to the windmill at the Old Mill POI. It's rigged to a trap in the stairs. Disarm the trap, and grab the shotgun [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8).

**Sniper Rifles**

*   **SVDM-2:** This sniper rifle offers high damage, penetration, and accuracy [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3). It can be looted from Leshy, a bandit leader at the abandoned factory, North-East of Zalissya [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   **M71 Super:** The M71 Super can one-shot the harder exoskeleton enemies in the head on veteran difficulty [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9).
*    **VS Vintar:** The VS Vintar is an excellent suppressed marksman rifle which has very comfortably taken players into the late stages of Stalker 2 [rockpapershotgun](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).

**Pistols**

*   **Rhino:** Considered one of the best pistols, the Rhino is a hard-hitting hunting revolver with the highest damage of any other pistol in the game [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). It uses AR ammunition and has a high penetration rating [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Find it on a body in the middle of Yantar [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   **Skif's Pistol:** The first weapon you will be given is actually worth keeping around for quite some time [screenrant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4). Fully upgraded, it can do some damage, and it is quite resilient and cheap to repair [screenrant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).

**Other**

*   **Gauss Gun:** Boasting excellent damage, the Gauss Gun can wipe out the toughest of enemies [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7). It can be found by completing the "In the Name of Science" side mission [gamerant](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).

**Important Considerations:**

*   **Ammo Availability:** Consider the availability of ammunition for your chosen weapon [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5). The AKM-74S is a good choice in this regard, as it uses a common ammo type [driffle](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   **Weapon Condition:** Be prepared to repair looted weapons, as they are often damaged [gamesradar](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   **Attachments:** Utilize attachments like scopes, suppressors, and extended magazines to enhance your weapons [deltiasgaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10).
*   **Playstyle:** Choose weapons that suit your preferred playstyle [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3). Do you prefer close-quarters combat, long-range engagements, or something in between? [indiatodaygaming](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3)
